publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6287 Stewart Stevenson: The Climate Change (Annual Targets) (Scotland) Order 2010—That the Transport, Infrastructure and Climate Change Committee committee recommends that the Climate Change (Annual Targets) (Scotland) Order 2010 be approved. Supported by: John Swinney*
